short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Portal DEX that facilitates custody-less cross-chain swaps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Join the Revolution with Portal Defi Wallet with DEX 3.0 – Your Gateway to Unprecedented Crypto Freedom”

Welcome to the future of crypto trading, where unparalleled security, speed, fast and cross chain tradability are built into the most secure multi currency wallet. Supporting a vast array of crypto assets and designed for those who demand the very best in security, Portal Defi Wallet is your all-in-one solution for securely participating in Defi, with any supported chain including Bitcoin. 

Transform your mobile device into the ultimate Bitcoin Wallet, NFT Wallet, ETH wallet, Lightning wallet and the only crypto wallet you'll ever need to trade across chain with the speed, security and beautiful, fun user experience. 

Why Portal Defi Wallet with DEX 3.0 Stands Out:
Exclusive Layer 2 Cross-Chain Atomic Swaps: Experience true freedom with our Layer 2 Cross-Chain technology that ensures your funds are always in your hands – no custodians, no wrapped assets, and absolutely no bridges.

Self-Custodial Security: With Portal Defi Wallet, you hold the keys to your kingdom. Your assets are your own, securely encrypted on your device, ensuring that only you can access them.

Multi-Chain Functionality Without Compromise: Enjoy support for Bitcoin, Ethereum, Eth layer 2s and many other blockchains and assets coming, without the complexity of wrapped assets or third-party custodians.

If you’re transitioning from the Trust Wallet Browser Extension, importing your wallet is seamless. New to Portal Defi Wallet? We'll guide you through a quick, secure setup process.

Join the  visionaries who trust Portal Defi Wallet for their crypto journey.
Your ideas, feedback, and need for support matter to us. Connect with us at support@portaldefi.com and follow our journey on Twitter: @Portal_Finance.

Your Security, Our Priority:
Fully non-custodial, security audited by the best in the business
Robust security features protect against unauthorized access.

Beyond Wallet Functionality:
Buy, sell, swap, and stake BTC, ETH and other supported assets effortlessly within the app.
Manage your NFT collections across different blockchains in one intuitive interface.
Leverage our integrated tax feature to simplify your crypto tax reporting.

Portal Defi Wallet: More than just a wallet, it’s a secure, self-custodial gateway to the vast universe of Web3 decentralized applications (dApps). Swap tokens across blockchains, explore NFTs, earn crypto rewards, and dive into the metaverse with ease.
Discover the most empowering way to manage your digital assets. Download Portal Defi Wallet now and take the first step towards true crypto freedom.
